com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.log

Class LogDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.xasdi_bridge.log.LogDefinition

  • public class LogDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    A LogDefinition object defines a schema of a log record.
    Author:
    yamamoto
    See Also:
    Log

      Constructor and Description
      LogDefinition(int id, long regionid)
      Creates a LogDefinition for the specified Region.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if the logs of this type (definition) is enabled. The following equation holds.
        isEnabled() = !isDisabled()
        Returns:
        true if the logs of this type (definition) is enabled

      • isDisabled

        public boolean isDisabled()
        Returns true if the logs of this type (definition) is disabled. The following equation holds.
        isDisabled() = !isEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if the logs of this type (definition) is disabled
